item.title: ‘Kpop Demon Hunters’ Becomes Netflix’s Most Watched Movie Ever
item.description: The animated hit passes ‘Red Notice,’ which held the top spot for more than three years.

item.title: YouTube Hits Six Consecutive Months as Top TV Distributor
item.description: The streamer once again leads Nielsen’s monthly rankings of media companies by share of viewing.

item.title: Streaming Hits Another Record High in July, Nielsen Says
item.description: YouTube and Netflix alone have more use than broadcast networks and tie cable for the month, while ‘Squid Game’ is the most streamed show.

item.title: Netflix’s Taylor-Serrano Boxing Match Brings in 6 Million Viewers
item.description: That audience would make the fight the most watched women’s pro sporting event of 2025 so far.
